comment: She was very nice and you can tell she loves her job. attendance is mandatory but she allows 6 unexcused absence. Her class is supper easy. All you have to do is show up and do the work. She is very understanding with late assignments and will work with you. She's so sweet overall. Def recommend this class.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: She was my favorite teacher, and I am taking her in English 1102. She is super kind and is there to help you with anything. People say she is a harsh grader, but if you ask her to revise your essay and go to the writing center, you can get an A on every essay. Attendance is mandatory, but all the classwork is an easy A. I loved her!!

Professor Morris is one of the kindest souls I have come across. She really loves her job and students. There are three major essays and in-class work on most days, so I would say attendance is mandatory. You can compare her style of teaching to a high school class, but she is efficient. She responds quickly to emails and is easy to get in contact.
Professor Morris is a wonderful professor and makes everything simple to understand. I'm also taking her 1102 class.
Ms. Morris was a wonderful teacher, as long as you do the work you can easily get a good grade in the class. She always replies to emails and never takes longer then a day to reply.

She's super nice and you can tell she really loves her job. You HAVE to go to class because there are in-class assignments basically every day and there is no way to make them up if you are absent. Tough grader on essays (3 total throughout the semester), but gives good feedback.
Ms. Morris is great! She makes you work for it, but as long as you show up, you will be fine since she gives lots of in-class assignments. She is quick at grading and very easy to talk to.
